front.title: IEEE Standard Environmental and Testing Requirements for Communications Networking Devices in Electric Power Substations - Amendment 1: Rated Altitude and Altitude Derating Factors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This amendment adds requirements to IEEE Std 1613-2003 relating to the altitude of installed communications networking devices, and the derating factors for dielectric power frequency tests and rated maximum ambient temperatures if the installation is above a specified altitude.
